title: HELP!Talked to a Riot employee on live chat..where's the feature at?
body: A few weeks ago I talked to a riot employee through live support chat. I seem to not find it anymore. I was on the support website and saw a bar on the right side of my computer to live chat. Any clue what happened?

replies.body: That's a little feature that we've been testing on and off recently. Anytime you put in a ticket, there's a chance that you could end up with a live chat. You're always welcome to shoot us a normal [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and if you'd like I can try to get you in touch with the person you spoke with in that chat as well ^_^!

> That's a little feature that we've been testing on and off recently. 

That's a little feature that needs to become a permanent addition. Make it happen, senpai. Don't let our memes only be dreams.

Never fear Ninjaguy69-kohai! If you all send enough energy I just might be able to get that up and running again in the next day or so.
